attributes.action: Stop Banks introducing charges for the administration of Current Accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many U.K. Banks are considering the introduction of charges for Current Accounts, even if they remain in credit.

It is obvious the the only consideration given is to increase profit even further (Barclays £8.5 Billion pounds profit in 2006!!!).  Many people are already crippled by debt and poor pay so please support this petition by adding your name.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
